dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Infringement: Eye-zine.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jessica Friedman [mailto:JFriedman@Jobson.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 3:30 PM
To: Response, Legal
Cc: webmaster@eyeglasses123.com
Subject: DMCA Notice of Infringement: Eye-zine.com

 

Dear Ms. Almeida (or whoever else this may concern):

 

Attached  is a DMCA notice on behalf of Jobson Medical Information LLC
against Eye-zine.com.  On information and belief, ThePlanet.com is the
ISP for Eye-zine.com as a result of having merged with ev1servers.net.
Also attached is a cease and desist letter that has been sent to
Eye-zine.com describing the infringement in more detail.

 

I look forward to hearing back from you.

 

Very truly yours,

 

Jessica Friedman

 

---Attached Document---

 

Jessica R. Friedman

General Counsel

Jobson Medical Information LLC

100 Avenue of the Americas

New York, NY 10013

Tel. 212-274-7057

Fax 212-431-5579

jfriedman@jobson.com

 

http://www.jobson.com/ 

 


		Legal Department	
		100 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY  10013
Phone:  212-274-7057
Fax:  212-431-5579
jfriedman@jobson.com


April 5, 2007


VIA E-MAIL legal-response@theplanet.com

DMCA Designated Agent
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
Att
